DataElement.preferredName: FACT-Cognitive Questionnaire Interruption Ability Past 7 Days How Important Score Five Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric response to a questionnaire item asking if an individual feels he/she can keep track of what is happening even if interrupted.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Cognitive; of or being or relating to or involving cognition._A general quality of life instrument intended for use with a variety of chronic illness conditions. A core instrument in the Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT) Measurement System, a system which has multiple disease-, treatment-, and condition-specific subscales to complement the FACT-G._A time interval during which there is a temporary cessation of something._The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment ._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cognitive; of or being or relating to or involving cognition.:A general quality of life instrument intended for use with a variety of chronic illness conditions. A core instrument in the Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT) Measurement System, a system which has multiple disease-, treatment-, and condition-specific subscales to complement the FACT-G.

Concepts.definition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.

A general quality of life instrument intended for use with a variety of chronic illness conditions. A core instrument in the Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT) Measurement System, a system which has multiple disease-, treatment-, and condition-specific subscales to complement the FACT-G.

Property.preferredDefinition: Interruption; a time interval during which there is a temporary cessation of something.:The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment .:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A time interval during which there is a temporary cessation of something.
The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/30/14 Released-part of metric review; moved to DCI context; associated CS/CSI.  jc

ValueDomain.preferredName: Past 7 Days How Important Score Five Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Five-point Likert scale representing how important something was that an individual experienced in the past 7 days._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::7_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._The relative importance granted to something._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated definition to match NCIt. mc 9/8/20

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Past Integer::7 Day Importance Weight Score Five Point Scale
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::7:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :The relative importance granted to something.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
The relative importance granted to something.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Modified VD created by UML Loader but not used in model for FAHI questionnaire. mc 2/3/12

ReferenceDocuments.name: I am able to keep track of wh
ReferenceDocuments.description: I am able to keep track of what I am doing, even if I am interrupted

DataElement.changeDescription: 4/30/14 Moved to DCI context; associated CS/CSI.  jc
